item.title: Fearlessness: How to Stop Running from Space
item.description:
The Space We Fear

We compulsively fill every waking moment:

  • Cramming more tasks into already packed schedules
  • Immediately responding to messages and notifications
  • Mindlessly scrolling through social media feeds
  • Consuming endless streams of content

We’ve developed what can only be called a phobia of empty space.

The consequences manifest as:

  • Chronic busyness as our default state
  • Constant distraction and avoidance behaviors
  • Eroded attention spans and diminished presence
  • A lingering dissatisfaction with our daily experience

What We’re Really Avoiding
